CustomField.formula: TEXT(Slab_1__c) & '/' &TEXT(FLOOR(slab_per_1__c))&"."&RIGHT(TEXT(slab_per_1__c*100), 2) & '/' &TEXT(Slab_val_1__c) & '/' & TEXT(Slab_2__c) & '/' &TEXT(FLOOR(slab_per_2__c))&"."&RIGHT(TEXT(slab_per_2__c*100), 2) & '/' &TEXT(Slab_Val_2__c) & '/' & TEXT(Slab_3__c) & '/' &TEXT(FLOOR(slab_per_3__c))&"."&RIGHT(TEXT(slab_per_3__c*100), 2) & '/' &TEXT(Slab_Val_3__c) & '/' & TEXT(Slab_4__c) & '/' &TEXT(FLOOR(slab_per_4__c))&"."&RIGHT(TEXT(slab_per_4__c*100), 2) & '/' &TEXT(Slab_Val_4__c) & '/' & TEXT(Slab_5__c) & '/' &TEXT(FLOOR(slab_per_5__c))&"."&RIGHT(TEXT(slab_per_5__c*100), 2) & '/' &TEXT(Slab_Val_5__c) & '/' & TEXT(Slab_6__c) & '/' &TEXT(FLOOR(slab_per_6__c))&"."&RIGHT(TEXT(slab_per_6__c*100), 2) & '/' &TEXT(slab_val_6__c) & '/' & TEXT(Slab_7__c) & '/' &TEXT(FLOOR(slab_per_7__c))&"."&RIGHT(TEXT(slab_per_7__c*100), 2) & '/' &TEXT(slab_val_7__c) & '/' & TEXT(Slab_8__c) & '/' &TEXT(FLOOR(slab_per_8__c))&"."&RIGHT(TEXT(slab_per_8__c*100), 2) & '/' &TEXT(slab_val_8__c)
CustomField.label: Slabs List
